sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID, A.EVAL_USER_GRP_NM, A.CONTENT, A.EVAL_CLOSING_YN, A.SORT_ORDER, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_USER B WHERE A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID=B.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID) USER_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_MAPPING B WHERE A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID=B.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID) MEMB_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_USER D WHERE A.YEAR=D.YEAR AND A.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID=D.EVAL_USER_GRP_ID AND D.EVAL_SUBMIT_YN='Y') SUBMIT_CNT FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_USER_GRP A WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
SELECT YEAR , EVAL_USER_GRP_ID , EVAL_USER_GRP_NM , EVAL_CLOSING_YN , CONTENT , SORT_ORDER FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_USER_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_USER_GRP_ID = #evalUserGrpId#
